physical_examinations.vital_signs: RR = 570 ms, QT = 501 ms, QTc = 664 ms
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Dysmorphic features such as high arched palate, full cheeks, congenital clasped thumb; severe developmental disability and hypotonia; unable to roll over at age 3.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: ECG at age 5 showed slightly prolonged QTc (RR = 559 ms, QT = 346 ms, QTc = 462 ms) compared to ECG at 2 months.
